description: Sony MDR-Q68LW Clip-on Style Headphones with Retractable Cord Clip-on headphone; Soft ear pads for sitcomfortable on the ear; Comfortable hanger w/ spring action to adjust ear size. Features: * Lightweight and thin body for stable fitting  * Retractable, silent cord (behind the neck cord and plug cord)  * 3.3ft cord  * Gold plated mini-plug
title: Sony MDR-Q68LW Clip-on Style Headphone with Retractable Cord
